00030 #include "config_dap.h"
00031 
00032 static char rcsid[] not_used = {"$Id$"};
00033 
00034 #include "Array.h"
00035 
00036 // Virtual constructors (to borrow a term from Meyers) for the DODS data type
00037 // classes. If geturl needed to overload the data type classes we'd use
00038 // NewByte, et c., to instantiate instnaces of the specialization of Byte, et
00039 // cetera. See DODS/src/tools/www-interface for an example of that. 5/28/2002
00040 // jhrg.
00041 Array *NewArray(const string &n = "", BaseType *v = 0) { return new Array(n, v); }
